title: ESPN.EA.Sports.NFL.Match.Up.Show.Super.Bowl
description:
Enclosed are 2 "episodes" of ESPN&#039;s EA Sports NFL Matchup Show. The X&#039;s and O&#039;s show for hard-core NFL fans, hosted by Sal Paolantonio with analysis from Ron Jaworski and Merril Hoge.

The first episode is the Super Bowl edition, breaking down the X&#039;s and O&#039;s of the Super Bowl matchup between the Pittsburgh Steelers and Seattle Seahawks.

The second episode is from a month ago, breaking down the matchups of Week 17.  It is by far the best episode this whole season.  I learned a TON watching that show.

If you&#039;re a NFL fan outside of America and havent seen this before, I HIGHLY recommend checking this out.  Download now and thank me later! :)


P.S. There&#039;ll be a post-Super Bowl recap episode next week.
